trans-unit.source: get_sites — Retrieves a list of sites matching the query vars.
trans-unit.target: get_sites —检索与查询变量匹配的站点列表。

trans-unit.source: parse_order — Parses an 'order' query variable and cast it to 'ASC' or 'DESC' as necessary.
trans-unit.target: parse_order —解析“ order”查询变量，并根据需要将其强制转换为“ ASC”或“ DESC”。

trans-unit.source: parse_orderby — Parses and sanitizes 'orderby' keys passed to the site query.
trans-unit.target: parse_orderby —解析和清理传递给站点查询的“ orderby”键。

trans-unit.source: parse_query — Parses arguments passed to the site query with default query parameters.
trans-unit.target: parse_query —使用默认查询参数解析传递给站点查询的参数。

trans-unit.source: query — Sets up the WordPress query for retrieving sites.
trans-unit.target: query —设置用于检索站点的WordPress查询。

trans-unit.source: set_found_sites — Populates found_sites and max_num_pages properties for the current query if the limit clause was used.
trans-unit.target: set_found_sites —如果使用了limit子句，则为当前查询填充found_sites和max_num_pages属性。

trans-unit.source: _css_href — Generates an enqueued style's fully-qualified URL.
add_inline_style — Adds extra CSS styles to a registered stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: add_inline_style —将额外的CSS样式添加到已注册的样式表中。

trans-unit.source: do_footer_items — Processes items and dependencies for the footer group.
trans-unit.target: do_footer_items —处理页脚组的项目和依赖项。

trans-unit.source: do_item — Processes a style dependency.
in_default_dir — Whether a handle's source is in a default directory.
trans-unit.target: in_default_dir —句柄的源是否在默认目录中。

trans-unit.source: print_inline_style — Prints extra CSS styles of a registered stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: print_inline_style —打印已注册样式表的其他CSS样式。

trans-unit.source: WP_Tax_Query is a helper that allows primary query classes, such as WP_Query, to filter their results by object metadata, by generating JOIN and WHERE subclauses to be attached to the primary SQL query string.
trans-unit.target: WP_Tax_Query是一个帮助程序，它通过生成要附加到主SQL查询字符串的 JOIN 和 WHERE 子句，允许主查询类（例如WP_Query）按对象元数据过滤其结果。

trans-unit.source: clean_query — Validates a single query.
find_compatible_table_alias — Identify an existing table alias that is compatible with the current query clause.
trans-unit.target: find_compatible_table_alias —标识与当前查询子句兼容的现有表别名。

trans-unit.source: get_sql — Generates SQL clauses to be appended to a main query.
trans-unit.target: get_sql —生成要附加到主查询的SQL子句。

trans-unit.source: get_sql_clauses — Generate SQL clauses to be appended to a main query.
trans-unit.target: get_sql_clauses —生成要附加到主查询的SQL子句。

trans-unit.source: get_sql_for_clause — Generate SQL JOIN and WHERE clauses for a "first-order" query clause.
trans-unit.target: get_sql_for_clause —为“一阶”查询子句生成SQL JOIN和WHERE子句。

trans-unit.source: get_sql_for_query — Generate SQL clauses for a single query array.
is_first_order_clause — Determine whether a clause is first-order.
sanitize_query — Ensure the 'tax_query' argument passed to the class constructor is well-formed.
trans-unit.target: sanitize_query —确保传递给类构造函数的'tax_query'参数格式正确。

trans-unit.source: transform_query — Transforms a single query, from one field to another.
trans-unit.target: transform_query —将单个查询从一个字段转换为另一个字段。

trans-unit.source: add_hooks — Registers the ajax callback for the meta box.
add_rewrite_rules — Adds the necessary rewrite rules for the taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: add_rewrite_rules —为分类法添加必要的重写规则。

trans-unit.source: get_rest_controller — Gets the REST API controller for this taxonomy.
remove_hooks — Removes the ajax callback for the meta box.
remove_rewrite_rules — Removes any rewrite rules, permastructs, and rules for the taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: remove_rewrite_rules —删除分类法的所有重写规则，永久结构和规则。

trans-unit.source: filter — Sanitizes term fields, according to the filter type provided.
trans-unit.target: filter —根据提供的过滤器类型清理术语字段。

trans-unit.source: to_array — Converts an object to array.
get_search_sql — Used internally to generate a SQL string related to the 'search' parameter.
trans-unit.target: get_search_sql —在内部用于生成与“搜索”参数相关的SQL字符串。

trans-unit.source: parse_orderby — Parse and sanitize 'orderby' keys passed to the term query.
trans-unit.target: parse_orderby —解析和清理传递给术语查询的“ orderby”键。

trans-unit.target: parse_orderby_meta —为可能与元查询相关的“ orderby”参数生成ORDER BY子句。

trans-unit.source: parse_query — Parse arguments passed to the term query with default query parameters.
trans-unit.target: parse_query —使用默认查询参数解析传递给术语查询的参数。

trans-unit.target: 查询 -设置查询以检索术语。

handle_row_actions — Generates and displays row action links.
inline_edit — Outputs the hidden row displayed when inline editing

trans-unit.source: __call — Make private/protected methods readable for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: __call —使私有/受保护的方法可读，以实现向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: __construct — Constructor - Call parent constructor with params array.
trans-unit.target: __construct —构造函数-使用params数组调用父构造函数。

trans-unit.source: __get — Make private properties readable for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: __get —使私有属性可读以便向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: __isset — Make private properties checkable for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: __isset —使私有属性可检查以实现向后兼容性。

trans-unit.source: __set — Make private properties settable for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: __set —使私有属性可设置为向后兼容。

trans-unit.target: __unset —使私有属性不可设置，以实现向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: _changed — Process changed lines to do word-by-word diffs for extra highlighting.
trans-unit.target: _changed —处理更改的行以逐字进行差异比较以额外突出显示。

trans-unit.source: compute_string_distance — Computes a number that is intended to reflect the "distance" between two strings.
trans-unit.target: compute_string_distance —计算一个旨在反映两个字符串之间的“距离”的数字。

trans-unit.source: interleave_changed_lines — Takes changed blocks and matches which rows in orig turned into which rows in final.
trans-unit.target: interleave_changed_lines —获取更改的块并匹配orig中的哪些行转换为final中的哪些行。

trans-unit.source: WP_Theme is a class that helps developers interact with a theme.
__get — __get() magic method for properties formerly returned by current_theme_info()
trans-unit.target: __get —以前由current_theme_info（）返回的属性的__get（）魔术方法

trans-unit.source: __isset — __isset() magic method for properties formerly returned by current_theme_info()
trans-unit.target: __isset —以前由current_theme_info（）返回的属性的__isset（）魔术方法

trans-unit.source: __toString — When converting the object to a string, the theme name is returned.
trans-unit.target: __toString —将对象转换为字符串时，将返回主题名称。

trans-unit.source: _name_sort — Callback function for usort() to naturally sort themes by name.
trans-unit.target: _name_sort — usort（）的回调函数，用于按名称对主题进行自然排序。

trans-unit.target: _name_sort_i18n — usort（）的回调函数，用于按翻译后的名称对主题进行自然排序。

trans-unit.source: cache_add — Adds theme data to cache.

cache_get — Gets theme data from cache.

trans-unit.source: display — Gets a theme header, formatted and translated for display.

trans-unit.source: exists — Whether the theme exists.
get — Get a raw, unformatted theme header.

trans-unit.source: get_files — Return files in the theme's directory.

trans-unit.source: get_stylesheet — The directory name of the theme's "stylesheet" files, inside the theme root.

trans-unit.source: get_template — The directory name of the theme's "template" files, inside the theme root.

is_allowed — Whether the theme is allowed (multisite only).

markup_header — Mark up a theme header.
